text: The Cookie UDR is used to set or read a Cookie. The following fields are included in the Cookie UDR : Field Description Field Description maxAge (int) This field may contain maximum age of the cookie in seconds. name (string) This field contain the name of the cookie. path (string) This field may contain a uri path for the cookie to which the client should return the cookie value (string) This field may contain the value of the cookie. If left empty meaning the cookie will be deleted.
title: Cookie UDR - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
